email.subject: I see you've been doing well
email.body:
Hey there #PLAYERNAME#,
I have to say I'm quite impressed with how well you've done during Hacking Wars. I don't regret choosing you out of all the failed applicants to enter into the competition.
I have a favour to ask, I could use your help. It's kind of embarassing being the one who helped you hack Hacker Wars.
Someone has stolen a file from me, and it's really important. I NEED that file back, and I can't get into their system, my IP would show up red flags everywhere, so it's up to you.
I must stress this file is TOP SECRET, and I cannot have you read it, you're just going to have to trust me.
Good luck! I'm sure you won't need it.
